sql.sql: select SERIALNO,CUSTOMERID,BUSINESSTYPE,productid,CONTRACTARTIFICIALNO,occurdate,GUARANTYTYPE,RPTTERMID,RESDERATIONREASONS,LOANRATETERMID from O where SERIALNO =#{applyserialno}

select BUSINESSTERMUNIT,BUSINESSTERM,BUSINESSSUM,BUSINESSTERMDAY,(select ob.orgid from jbo.sys.ORG_BELONG ob where exists (select 1 from jbo.awe.ORG_INFO oi where oi.orgid = ob.orgid and oi.orglevel = 2 ) and ob.BELONGORGID = O.ACCOUNTINGORGID) as v.relativeorgId,NONSTDINDICATOR,VOUCHTYPE,loantype from O where SERIALNO=#{applyserialno}

select sum(case when ApproveStatus in(@{APPLYING},@{SUPERVISE_PASS}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and BUSINESSTYPE not in (@{IND_CREDIT_LOAN},@{ACC_FUND_HOUSE_LOAN}) then BUSINESSSUM else 0 end) as v.SUMBUSINESSSUM from O where CustomerID = ${customerid}

select sum(case when ApproveStatus in(@{APPLYING},@{SUPERVISE_PASS}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and BUSINESSTYPE in(@{IND_NEW_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_OLD_HOUSE_LOAN}) then BUSINESSSUM else 0 end) as v.SUMBUSINESSSUM from O where CustomerID = ${customerid}

select sum(case when ApproveStatus in(@{ACCEPT},@{APPROVING}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and BUSINESSTYPE in(@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_RELAY_LOAN}) then 1 else 0 end) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CustomerID = ${customerid}

select sum(case when ApproveStatus in(@{ACCEPT},@{APPROVING}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and BUSINESSTYPE in(@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_RELAY_LOAN}) then 1 else 0 end) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CustomerID = ${relativecustomerid}
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where APPLYSERIALNO =#{applyserialno} and RELATIVETYPE =@{LIMIT_ABOUT}
select objectno,objecttype from O where applyserialNo = #{applyserialno} and RELATIVETYPE =@{ACCUMULATION_FUND_COMBINATION_APPLY}
select objectno,objecttype from O where applyserialNo =#{applyserialno} and RELATIVETYPE =@{LIMIT_ABOUT}
select objectno from O where applyserialNo = #{applyserialno} and RELATIVETYPE = '11' and objecttype= 'jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY'
select RELATIVECUSTOMERID from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and RELATIONSHIP =@{SPOUSE}
select SERIALNO from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid}
select businesssum,businessterm from O where serialNo =${relativeGjjObjectNo}
select max(serialNo) as v.lastApplyserialNo from O where O.contractartificialno = ${contractArtificialNo} and serialNo != #{applyserialno}
select RATEFLOAT,BUSINESSRATE,BASERATE from O where OBJECTNO =#{applyserialno} and OBJECTTYPE = 'jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY' and ratetype =@{NORMALRATE} and termid = ${loanRateTermId}

select BUSINESSRATE from O where OBJECTNO =${relativeGjjObjectNo} and OBJECTTYPE = 'jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY' and ratetype =@{NORMALRATE} and termid = (select ba.loanRateTermId from jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY ba where ba.serialNo = ${relativeGjjObjectNo} )
select PAYFREQUENCYTYPE,SEGTERM from O where OBJECTNO =#{applyserialno} and OBJECTTYPE = 'jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY'
select termid,segterm from O where OBJECTNO =${relativeGjjObjectNo} and OBJECTTYPE = 'jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY'
select CUSTOMERNAME,CERTTYPE,CERTID,MFCUSTOMERID from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid}
select BIRTHDAY,COUNTRY,EDUEXPERIENCE,MARRIAGE,INDUSTRYTYPE,HABITATIONSTATUS,JOBYEARS,CECUSREGISTERTYPE,SEX,HAVECHILDREN,FIXEDABODEFLAG,DWELLNUM,CUSTOMERGRADE from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid}
select SUM(AMOUNT) as v.SUMAMOUNT from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and FINANCIALITEM =@{MON_PERSONAL_INCOME}
select SUM(AMOUNT) as v.SUMAMOUNT from O where CUSTOMERID =${relativecustomerid} and FINANCIALITEM = @{MON_PERSONAL_INCOME}
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and BUSINESSSTATUS =@{BUSINESS_STATUS_NORMAL}
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and BUSINESSSTATUS in(@{BUSINESS_STATUS_OVERDUE},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_DULL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_BADDEBT})
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CUSTOMERID =${relativecustomerid} and BUSINESSSTATUS =@{BUSINESS_STATUS_NORMAL}
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CUSTOMERID =${relativecustomerid} and BUSINESSSTATUS in(@{BUSINESS_STATUS_OVERDUE},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_DULL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_BADDEBT})

select SUM(BALANCE) as v.SUMBALANCE from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and BUSINESSTYPE in(@{IND_NEW_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_OLD_HOUSE_LOAN}) and BusinessStatus in(@{BUSINESS_STATUS_NORMAL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_OVERDUE},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_DULL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_BADDEBT})

select SUM(BALANCE) as v.SUMBALANCE from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and BusinessStatus in(@{BUSINESS_STATUS_NORMAL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_OVERDUE},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_DULL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_BADDEBT})

select count(1) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CustomerID =${customerid} and BusinessStatus in(@{BUSINESS_STATUS_NORMAL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_OVERDUE},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_DULL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_BADDEBT}) and BUSINESSTYPE in(@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_RELAY_LOAN})

select count(1) v.COUNTRESULT from O where CustomerID =${relativecustomerid} and BusinessStatus in(@{BUSINESS_STATUS_NORMAL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_OVERDUE},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_DULL},@{BUSINESS_STATUS_BADDEBT}) and BUSINESSTYPE in(@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_RELAY_LOAN})
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and LISTTYPE =@{PEOPLE_BANK_BLACKLIST}
select count(*) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CUSTOMERID =${customerid} and LISTTYPE =@{LOCAL_BANK_BLACKLIST}

select ASSETSERIALNO,GUARANTYAMOUNT from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.APPLY_RELATIVE ar where ar.applyserialno = ${applyserialno} and ar.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and ar.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '020%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select count(*) as v.assetcount from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.APPLY_RELATIVE ar where ar.applyserialno = ${applyserialno} and ar.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and ar.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '020%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select ASSETSERIALNO from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.APPLY_RELATIVE ar where ar.applyserialno = ${applyserialno} and ar.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and ar.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '040%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select count(*) as v.asset2count from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.APPLY_RELATIVE ar where ar.applyserialno = ${applyserialno} and ar.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and ar.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '040%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select ASSETSERIALNO from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.APPLY_RELATIVE ar where ar.applyserialno = ${applyserialno} and ar.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and ar.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.serialno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.app.ASSET_INFO ai where ai.assettype like '%20100100%' and ai.serialno = O.ASSETSERIALNO)

select ASSETSERIALNO,GUARANTYAMOUNT from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.CONTRACT_RELATIVE cr where cr.contractserialno = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and cr.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and cr.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '020%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select count(*) as v.assetcount from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.CONTRACT_RELATIVE cr where cr.contractserialno = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and cr.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and cr.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '020%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select ASSETSERIALNO from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.CONTRACT_RELATIVE cr where cr.contractserialno = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and cr.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and cr.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '040%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select count(*) as v.asset2count from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.CONTRACT_RELATIVE cr where cr.contractserialno = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and cr.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and cr.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.guarantytype like '040%' and gc.serialno = O.gcserialno )

select ASSETSERIALNO from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.CONTRACT_RELATIVE cr where cr.contractserialno = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and cr.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and cr.objectno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.serialno = O.gcserialno ) and exists (select 1 from jbo.app.ASSET_INFO ai where ai.assettype like '%20100100%' and ai.serialno = O.ASSETSERIALNO)

select sum(balance) as v.balance from O where exists (select 1 from jbo.app.CONTRACT_RELATIVE cr where cr.objecttype = 'jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT' and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_CONTRACT gc where gc.serialno = cr.objectno and exists (select 1 from jbo.guaranty.GUARANTY_RELATIVE gr where gc.serialno = gr.gcserialno and gr.assetserialNo = ${HouseAssetSerialNoList}) ) and cr.contractserialno = O.contractserialno)
select ISCOLLATERAL,ASSETTYPE,ASSETSERIALNO,FIRSTORSECOND,CONTRACTAMOUNT,COUNTPARTYNAME,COUNTPARTYREGION from O where OBJECTTYPE ='jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY' and OBJECTNO =#{applyserialno}
select FLOORAREA,STANDARDUSEYEARS,REMAININGUSEYEARS,COMPLETIONDATE from O where ASSETSERIALNO =${assetserialno}
select FLOORAREA,COMPLETIONDATE,REMAININGUSEYEARS from O where ASSETSERIALNO =${AssetSerialNoList}
select VEHICLEOWNERSHIP,ORIGIN,USEDETAIL,LICENCETYPE,PURCHASEDATE,VEHICLETYPE from O where ASSETSERIALNO =${assetserialno}
select EVALUATEVALUE,CONFIRMVALUE from O where SERIALNO =${assetserialno}
select EVALUATEVALUE,CONFIRMVALUE from O where SERIALNO =${AssetSerialNoList}

select case when af.balance is null then O.confirmvalue else af.balance end as v.balance, case when af.currency is null then O.CONFIRMVALUECURRENCY else af.currency end as v.currency from O left join jbo.guaranty.ASSET_FINANCE af on af.assetserialno = O.serialno where O.serialno = ${Asset2SerialNoList}
select ASSETTYPE from O where serialNo =${AssetSerialNoList}
select ASSETTYPE from O where serialNo =${Asset2SerialNoList}

select LASTRETAINEDPROFITS,REALTYPOLICY,BUSINESSORIENTATION,UPORDOWNINDUSTRYFLAG,SALESGROWTH,ADVANTAGE,PROSPECT,AUDITOPINION,ESTABLISHDATE,LOCALUNDERTAKING,SPDBLSACCOUNTS,SHAREHOLDERSCREDIT,COLLINREGION,NATIVEDWELLNUM,RATEPAYINGCERTYFY,HOUSEHOLDREGISTER,LOWRISKASSETS,YEARLYREVENUES,PLATINUMCARDFLAG,UNFINISHEDLOANNO ,Assetliabilityratio1,ENTERPRISECREDIT,LOANBALANCE,LOANODBALANCE,OPERATINGPERIOD,REALTYFLAG,HIGHQUALITYCUSTOMER,FAMILYMONTHLYINCOME,WORSTCREDITLEVEL,FAMILYMONTHLYDEBT,YEARLYODTIMES,YEARLYODTERMS,EASYTOLOANBUSINESS,ASSETLIABILITYRATIO1,BUSINESSINCOMESCALE,SOLDGROWTHRATE,PLEDGETYPE,HOUSELEVEL,HOUSEHOLDREGISTER from O where OBJECTNO =#{applyserialno} and OBJECTTYPE = 'jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY'
select TOTALAMOUNT from O where objectno = #{applyserialno} and objecttype='jbo.app.BUSINESS_APPLY'
select BUSINESSAVAAMT from O where OBJECTTYPE = ${relativeCLObjectType} and OBJECTNO = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and CLTYPE =@{TOT_CREADIT_AMT}
select BUSINESSAVAAMT,BUSINESSAVABALANCE from O where OBJECTTYPE = ${relativeCLObjectType} and OBJECTNO = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and CLTYPE =@{CONSUMEPOOL_AMT}
select BUSINESSAVAAMT,BUSINESSAVABALANCE from O where OBJECTTYPE = ${relativeCLObjectType} and OBJECTNO = ${relativeCLObjectNo} and CLTYPE =@{WORKINGPOOL_AMT}

select sum(case when PutOutStatus in(@{APPLYING},@{SUPERVISE_PASS}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and Businesstype in(@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_RELAY_LOAN}) then 1 else 0 end) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CustomerID = ${customerid}

select sum(case when PutOutStatus in(@{APPLYING},@{SUPERVISE_PASS}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and Businesstype in(@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_BUSINESS_HOUSE_RELAY_LOAN}) then 1 else 0 end) as v.COUNTRESULT from O where CustomerID = ${relativecustomerid}
select sum(case when PutOutStatus in(@{APPLYING},@{SUPERVISE_PASS}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} then businesssum else 0 end) as v.SUMBUSINESSSUM from O where CustomerID = ${customerid}

select sum(case when PutOutStatus in(@{APPLYING},@{SUPERVISE_PASS}) and OccurType = @{NEWOCCUR} and Businesstype in(@{IND_NEW_HOUSE_LOAN},@{IND_OLD_HOUSE_LOAN}) then businesssum else 0 end) as v.SUMBUSINESSSUM from O where CustomerID = ${customerid}
select INDUSTRYTYPE from O where customerid = ${customerid}

unti.name: nation
unti.describe: 申请人国籍或所属地区

unti.name: odc6month
unti.describe: 近6个月信用卡是否逾期

unti.name: odc6monthamount
unti.describe: 近6个月信用卡逾期金额
